verses.content: Pathien hming le a închûktirna thu hrilsieta a um nâwna dingin, suok rîngkawl bât taphawthai chun anni puhai iengkimah chawimawi tlâkah ngai raw hai se.

Chun, ringtu pu neihai chun, unau an ni leiin ngainêp naw raw hai se; amiruokchu, ṭhathnemna hmutu- hai chu ringtu le dittakhai an ni leiin an rawng bâwlpêk zuol lem raw hai se. Hieng thu hi inchûktir la, infui rawh.
Mi tûkhawmin inchûktirna dang ân chûktir a, thutak (Ei Lalpa Isu Krista thu) le, Pathien ngaisakna inchûktirna tieng a awi naw chun,

ama chu a chapo a, iengkhawm a hriet nawh a, hriet nêk hmanin insêl le thu kal kawnga chun ân vêt ta lem a nih. Chuonga inthawk chun, inhnarna dâm, insuolna dâm, hril- sietna dâm, a ṭha naw tieng ringna dâm a hung suok a,
lungril sie nei le thutak nei naw mi nina, sêlhrâtna dâm a suok hlak; chuonghai chu, Pathien ngaisak hi hlâwkna amanih titu an nih.
Pathien ngaisak hi lungawina ṭhang chun hlâwkna nasatak a ni hrim a nih.
Khawvêla hin iengkhawm ei lûtpui nawh a, iengkhawm ei suokpui thei bawk nawh.
Nisienlakhawm, fâk ding le sil ding neiin, chuonga chun lungawi ei tih.
Amiruokchu, hausak tumtuhai chu thlêmnaa dâm, chânga dâm, invêtthlâk le sukkhawhlo thei inhâwkna tamtaka dâm an tlu lût a, chuong inhâwknahai chun sietna le bohmangnaah mi a suktlum hlak.
Tangka sum ngainat hi suol tinrêng bul a ni sih a; chu chu ṭhenkhatin an inhnar a, ringna chu an fe hmang san a, anni le anni lungngaina tamtakin an insun tlang ta nghuon a.
Nisienlakhawm, nang Pathien mi, chuong thilhai chu tlânsan la, felna dâm, Pathien ngaisakna dâm, ringna dâm, hmangaina dâm, daw- theina dâm, thuhnuoirawlna dâm hnawt pei rawh.
Ringna inruolsiekna ṭha chu thaw la, chatuon hringna chu chel rawh; chu chu chang dinga ko i na, hretu tamtakhai mithmuah ṭanna ṭha chu i ṭan ta kha.
Pathien thil tinrêng sukhringtu le, Krista Isu, Pontia Pilat hmaa ṭanna ṭha ṭantu mithmua chun, thu ka pêk che;
ei Lalpa Isu hung inlar nâwk hmakhat chu thupêk kha sawisêlbo le inthiengtaka pawm dingin.
Chu inlârna chu a hun taka chun inpâktlâk thuneitu tak chau, laltakhai laltak, lalhai lal chun inentir a ti che.

Ama chau chun thi thei nawna a nei a, var hnai thei ruol loa chun a um a, ama chu tûkhawmin an hmu ngai nawh a, hmu khawm an hmu thei naw bawk a, ama kuoma chun chatuona chawimawina le thilthawtheina chu um raw se. Amen.
Hi khawvêla hausahai hi chapo naw ding le sum ringum nawah an beiseina innghat loa, thil po po lâwm- na dinga mi petu Pathien chunga chun innghat lem dingin kâwk rawh.
Thil ṭha thaw dingin, thil ṭha thaw hau dingin, tiktlaia thâwlâwm pe pei dingin,
hringna, hringna taktak chu an vawng theina dingin, hun hung tlung dinga ding chun lungphûm ṭhatak an ta dinga lo rem dingin infui rawh.
Aw Timothe, i kuoma inkawltira um chu kawl ṭha rawh, Pathien inzâ naw tieng thu hril mei mei le, indik nawtaka, “Varna,” an iti insêlna hi nghat san rawh.
Chu chu ṭhenkhathaiin nei amanih insâwnin, ringna chu an fe kawisan tah a. Lunginsietna in kuomah um raw se.
